<title level="1" pfs="">[Sage](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3593)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The greatest knowledge comes from experience. Village elders, ancient seers, and advisors to royalty are examples of those valued for such wisdom. Sages educate and guide their people from straying from their cultures' norms and traditions.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Sage](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3593)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 141

**Perception** +14

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1); up to 4 additional languages

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35) +12, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +13, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=42) +12, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43) +14, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44) +12, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46) +12, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +2

**Con** +1

**Int** +4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[religious symbol](/Armor.aspx?ID=22), _+1 [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=367)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +16 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 86

</row>

**Timely Advice** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=541), [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=642), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647)) **Trigger** An ally is about to attempt an attack roll or skill check and has not yet rolled; **Effect** The sage gives the ally a savvy piece of advice, providing valuable insight. The ally gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_staff_ +13 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 bludgeoning

**Sage's Analysis** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The sage studies a creature, attempting an [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43), [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44), [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46), or [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) check against the creature's [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367) DC. On a success, the sage gains a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls and AC against that creature and deals an additional 2d6 damage to the creature with weapon attacks. These benefits last for 1 minute or until the sage uses this ability again.

</column>
